title: Daily Eats
name: Daily Eats
description:
A Map by Dailyeats

Daily Eats food lover's map. Put your fork on the map and tell us what's your favorite Daily Eats.

properties.name: Aliza Sherman
properties.description: Posted by DailyeatsAlaskaAre Your Buns Sticky? What was it with these towns in the West? I swore there was a breakfast pastry called a Sticky Bun but according to the experts I was meeting along my drive to Alaska, the idea was an almost pornographic figment of my imagination.

properties.name: Daily Eats Food Lovers Unite
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats  Phoenix, AZWhat\'s your favorite Daily Eats and where is it located? Put your flag on the map and tell the world what you love to eat.

properties.name: Daily Eats Interview: Chef Helen Anaya - Canela Culinary Services
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats Gilbert, AZChef Helen Anaya tells Daily Eats all about Mexican Gourmet cooking. Cooking is Helen Anaya’s passion. She describes how to prepare napal (catus), her signature Latino Spinach Salad, and Sofrito. Helen prepared these delicious dishes for us to try today. She made a special dessert in honor my love of chocolate: Abuelita Chocolate – lovely spicy chocolate pudding which sits inside a small pie shell. Chef Anaya\'s Canela Culinary Services located in Gilbert, AZ. Chef at canela culinary dot com Phone: 480-205-6132

properties.name: Daily Eats Interview: Karin Collins SpoonFed Art
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats La, CAKarin Collins is the jewelry designer and creator of SpoonFed Art. Karin started designing collages as a means of artistic therapy for an eating disorder and this eventually turned into SpoonFed Art. Her jewelry designs are mystical and beautiful. She tells us about her art. Karin\'s favorite Daily Eats is: Sushi from Matsuhisa, LA by Nobu Matsuhisa.

properties.name: Daily Eats: Bella Cuba - South Beach, FL
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats   1659 Washington Avenue, South Beach, Miami, FloridaBella Cuba - Fine Cuban Cuisine Restaurant

properties.name: Daily Eats: Chocolate Review: McIntyres Candies
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats1419 Eleventh Avenue, Altoona, PA 16601Review of McIntyres Candies: 2lb. box of McIntyres chocolates including Marshmallow Dark Chocolate, Crispy Bark (dark chocolate), and Non-Parells (dark chocolate).

properties.name: Daily Eats: South Beach, Miami: Hosteria Romana
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats   1230 Ocean Drive, South Beach, FloridaRestaurant review: Hosteria Romana 1230 Ocean Drive, South Beach, Florida Michelle was our fine dining hostess. Insalada Mediterranea 3 lb Maine Lobster with home made pasta diavolo style.

properties.name: Donald and Victoria Trafton
properties.description: Posted by DailyeatsScottsdale, AZ

properties.name: Drift - Scottsdale, AZ - Waste Not
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats 4341 N. 75th St, Scottsdale, AZ 85251An evening out for Waste Not Celebrity Chef Challenge at Drift Scottsdale, AZ. Chef Jake Wallin create special appetizer Pele\'s Peanut Shrimp for this very important event. Olivia Frezo of 3TV sponsored this dish. Special thanks to Matt, the manager and Courtney our lovely dining hostess.

properties.name: El Charro Cafe The Original
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats  311 N. Court Ave. Tucson, Arizona 85701Dining at El Charro, the oldest restaurant in the US was a delicious treat and the margaritas were excellent. The conversation over burritos was enlightening. The interior of El Charro was delightful warm and inviting. I only wish we arrived at El Charro earlier in the evening. It would seem everything in Tucson closes around 9 pm this New Yorker is just not use to the streets rolling up so early.

properties.name: Fix Las Vegas
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats 3600 Las Vegas Blvd. S. Las Vegas, Nevada 89109Food was beautifully presented. The winner of the evening was the Yellowtail Sashimi Jalapeño, Ponzu topped with thinly sliced jalapeño and one leaf of cilontro, splashed with citrus juice. Pumpkin filled ravioli in a sage butter sauce was very tasty. Scallops "Benedict", wrapped in Apple Wood Bacon, Crab Hollandaise was enjoyed. As was the very beautiful Shrimp "Louis" & Coctail Sauce. The only complaint from our party of 8 was the pork chop was under cooked.

properties.name: Grasslands
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats  3119 Hwy. 83, P. O. Box 513 Sonoita, AZ 85637If you’re looking for a yummy treat smack dab in the middle of no where, don’t look any further. Grasslands is a food paradise located in Sonoita where route 83 goes from south to east. Stop the car, or whatever you’re driving get out and have lunch! Dine like a New Yorker. Order the split pea soup! Then have the Southwest Quiche which is “a flavor blend from mild chilies, black olives, chives, cilantro, cumin and organic cheddar.”(Grasslands) Wash it down with prickly pear lemonade. Or enjoy a warm broccoli croissant. Don’t forget to order the double layer chocolate cake all baked fresh at the Grasslands.

properties.name: Hal's Bar & Grill
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats 1349 Abbot Kinney Blvd Venice, CA 90291-3739Lisa Nugent met me at Hals Bar and Grill. It is a spacious delight with very good food so good my brother, Tom Spataro, met me there later in the afternoon. While dining with Lisa I had the House Cobb Salad which is tossed mixed greens, chicken, bacon, bleu cheese, tomato, avocado, egg and dijon vinaigrette. Refreshing and delightful. Tom met me later in the afternoon at Hal’s. Tom told me the Pineapple-Carrot Cake with fresh pineapple, and coconut sorbet was very unusual with its chunks of carrot and pineapple.

properties.name: Hogs and Heffers
properties.description: Posted by DailyeatsWashington St., New York, New YorkFrom Hell\'s Kitchen we took a cab to West Chelsea and walked to the Meat Packing District where we shopped at Jeffrey\'s and Stella McCarthney. Shopping can make you very thirsty and off we walked to Hoggs and Heffer\'s for an afternoon dance on the bar, game of pool, and song.

properties.name: Marmalade Café
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats 3894 Cross Creek Road, Malibu, CAI had the Marmalade’s Huevos Rancheros. As you can see it is a huge plate! I highly recommend bringing an appetite, every bite was very yummy.

properties.name: Paul's Place - Da Burger Joint
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats 131 2nd Ave New York, NY 10003Daily Eats met friends at Paul\'s Place "da Burger Joint" in the East Village to decide if indeed this is the burger joint. Mine had Monetery Jack cheese, grilled onions and heaping of fries. Cooked to perfection!

properties.name: Pie Zanos Kitchen -
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats 4743 N. 29th Street, Phoenix, AZ 85016Pie Zanos Kitchen is a unique pizza place created by Mike Curtiss. He lets his customers build their own pizza. Located in Phoenix, AZ in the Town & Country Shopping Center. Mike\'s favorite Daily Eats is a meatball sandwich with lots of sloppy red sauce, cheese and red onions. Listen to my interview with Mike. Location: Pie Zanos Kitchen - Town and Courntry Shopping Center

properties.name: Silver Lake Wine
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats2395 Glendale Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90039Thanks to Lisa Napoli, who turned me on to the hottest place in LA! A wine store by day and on Thursday and Sunday they having wine tastings. You get 1 flight for 2. Randy Clement, owner, founded a great way to promote wine and create a happening scene for wine loving Angolans. Mix and mingle while sipping.

properties.name: Taste
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats 8454 Melrose Avenue, West Hollywood, CA 90069I spent the evening with Bill Firing, Joseph Cole and Terence Bogan at Taste. I had the orange ginger shrimp, rice stick noodles, asparagus, red pepper, cilantro, oranges, scallions, and citrus ginger sauce, which was outstanding. Taste is a casual place great for hanging out with friends and enjoy delicious food. As always it was great to see Bill, Joseph and Terence. Of course Terence filled us in on the up and coming spring fashions! Short, short skirts not for me.

properties.name: Vice Versa Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats 325 West 51st Street Frnt, New York, NY, 10019Vice Versa Restaurant

Chef Jake Wallin create special appetizer Pele\'s Peanut Shrimp for this very important event. Olivia Frezo of 3TV sponsored this dish. Special thanks to Matt, the manager and Courtney our lovely dining hostess.

properties.name: artist Titia Ex
properties.description: Posted by Dailyeats  amsterdam, hollandYou can listen to TItia Ex\'s description of her extraordinary envirmental designs. http://www.dailyeats.com/2006/05/daily-eats-food-for-soul.html

properties.name: the Live and Let Live Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Kurael    4711 N 7th St Phoenix az 85015Our goal at the Live and Let Live café is to provide Great food and Beverages in an inviting, artistically stimulating, family friendly environment. A place to get together with friends and leave the world behind.
